TopicTitle: i keep getting autoloc things for my breakingground expansion

Articles.Content: when i open ksp everything works. but when i go to my hangar and look at the new robotics tab with all of the hinges and pistons. the problem is everything in the breaking ground dlc is named autoloc. every name, setting and descriptions are all named autoloc. this only effects the breaking ground dlc. nothing else. how do i fix this
Looks like you have either a bad localisation file or it’s missing entirely. Try re-downloading the DLC or (on steam) verifying the game files.
Same here. All localization files (except making history) are there. i dunno where making history localization file went......
Redownload the DLC and it should show up, or verify the files if you got the game via Steam.
